title: How Tren Works
text: Tren utitlizes AI techniques to empower students to take their education into their own hands. By crowdsourcing notes, Tren is able to create a community for students to share their notes. The TrenAI will then compile all of the notes into one unified note for later reference. Especially during turbulent times, Tren is a life saver for students as they prepare for quizzes, test, or just review content if they were sick.
